named-query.name: Employee.searchById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE e.id = :searchKeyword

named-query.name: Employee.searchByName
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE e.name LIKE :searchName

named-native-query.name: Employee.searchDeptId
named-native-query.query: SELECT e.ID , e.NAME AS ename , e.SALARY , d.NAME AS dname FROM S_EMP e INNER JOIN S_DEPT d ON e.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID WHERE e.DEPT_ID = :deptId
